Apple Pay sedaj na voljo strankam Intese Sanpaolo Bank

06 Nov 2019, 12:13

Intesa Sanpaolo Bank imetnikom kartic Visa omogoča uporabo Apple Pay storitve ter tako ponuja enostavna, varna in zasebna mobilna plačila. Potrošniki lahko z Apple Pay svoj iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad in iMac uporabljajo za hitra in priročna plačila v trgovinah, na spletnih straneh in v aplikacijah.
Varnost in zasebnost sta osrednja elementa Apple Pay. Ko z Apple Pay uporabljate kreditno ali debetno kartico, se številka kartice ne shrani na napravi ali na strežnikih družbe Apple. Sistem namesto tega napravi dodeli unikatno namensko številko (Device Account Number), ki se šifrira in varno shrani v elektronskem čipu na vaši napravi. Vsaka transakcija se potrdi z uporabo enkratne dinamične varnostne kode.
Namestitev Apple Pay je enostavna. Potrošniki lahko z Apple Pay s svojimi napravami iPhone in Apple Watch plačujejo v trgovinah, restavracijah, za taksi storitve, za izdelke iz prodajnih avtomatov in še marsikje drugje. Nakupovanje z Apple Pay znotraj aplikacij ali na spletu z uporabo brskalnika Safari pomeni, da ni več potrebe po izpolnjevanju dolgoveznih obrazcev z uporabnikovimi podatki ali ponovnem vnašanju podatkov glede naslova za dostavo in podatkov za obračunavanje. Vsak nakup z uporabo Apple Pay je potrjen z uporabo kamere ali čitalnika prstnih odtisov ter Face ID in Touch ID tehnologij, ali z geslom naprave.
Za več informacij o Apple Pay obiščite:  https://www.apple.com/si/apple-pay/
text:
Apple Pay now available to Intese Sanpaolo Bank customers

06 Nov 2019, 12:13

Intesa Sanpaolo Bank enables Visa cardholders to use the Apple Pay service to offer easy, secure and private mobile payments. Consumers can use Apple Pay with their iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad and iMac to make quick and convenient payments in stores, websites and apps.
Security and privacy are central elements of Apple Pay. When you use a credit or debit card with Apple Pay, the card number is not stored on your device or Apple's servers. Instead, the system assigns a unique Device Account Number to the device, which is encrypted and securely stored in an electronic chip on your device. Each transaction is confirmed using a unique dynamic security code.
Installing Apple Pay is easy. Consumers can use Apple Pay with their iPhones and Apple Watch to pay at stores, restaurants, taxi services, vending machines and more. Buying with Apple Pay within apps or online using Safari means that you no longer have to fill out long forms with user information or re-enter your shipping address and billing information. Every purchase made using Apple Pay is authenticated using a camera or fingerprint reader, with Face ID and Touch ID technologies, or with a device password.
For more information on Apple Pay, visit: https://www.apple.com/en/apple-pay/
